channel.title: The Brewhouse Show
channel.description: The Brewhouse Show is about designing and developing products people love.

channel.itunes:subtitle: Designing and developing products people love.

item.title: Episode 17: Interview w/ Joe Stump, cofounder of Sprintly, SimpleGeo, and attachments.me
item.description:
This week, Kalv and Pat are joined by technical leader and serial entrepreneur, Joe Stump. As the founder of Sprint.ly, SimpleGeo, and Attachments.me, Joe has gained a tremendous amount of knowledge and wisdom which he graciously shared with our listeners during a live Blab.im chat.

Show Notes

  • The Other Joe Stump
  • Sprint.ly
  • Daniel Burka
  • eNotes
  • TLS
  • Design is how it works
  • Twitter Bot Makes Death Threat
  • Snapchat Lenses
  • Follow Kalv on Twitter
  • Follow Pat on Twitter

The Brewhouse Show is proudly hosted by Feedpress, a simple, intuitive, and powerful RSS analytics and podcast hosting platform. Use the promo code brewhouse at checkout for 10% off your first year.

item.title: Episode 16: Bootstrapping a Product Agency
item.description:
Some companies spend more time crafting investment and sales pitch decks in PowerPoint than designing prototypes, running user tests, and developing a shippable product. Regardless of your business model or marketing strategy, you need to produce something that people will use. Something that improves someone’s life, something they will tell their friends and family and co-workers about, something that that is born of empathy, innovation, technical skill, a truck load of coffee, and time.

As a product agency, Brewhouse is able to invest the profit we generate from our consulting service into Goodbits, a simple tool for curating and sending email newsletters, and still turn a profit as a business. Find out how on this week’s episode of The Brewhouse Show.

Show Notes

  • Shawn Blanc
  • Small Giants
  • Hard Things About Hard Things
  • Dustin Curtis: Revenue per employee, 2015
  • Dustin Curtis: Profit per employee, 2015
  • Brewhouse 2015 - by the numbers
  • Industrial Research Assistance Program (IRAP)
  • Picatic
  • Go Free Range
  • Follow Kalv on Twitter
  • Follow Pat on Twitter

The Brewhouse Show is proudly hosted by Feedpress, a simple, intuitive, and powerful RSS analytics and podcast hosting platform. Use the promo code brewhouse at checkout for 10% off your first year.

Download Episode 16: Bootstrapping a Product Agency

item.title: Episode 15: Work Adequately, Live Abundantly
item.description:
Every week has 168 hours. Who we are as people is a culmination of how each of us decides to spend that time. This week, Kalv and Pat discuss how we value time at Brewhouse, whether the various benefits some tech companies offer their employees are for the sake of the employee or the company, and what changes we are contemplating here at Brewhouse to further improve the work/life balance of our own team members.

Show Notes

  • Need Sleep by Pat Dryburgh
  • Sleep Cycle
  • Follow Kalv on Twitter
  • Follow Pat on Twitter

The Brewhouse Show is proudly hosted by Feedpress, a simple, intuitive, and powerful RSS analytics and podcast hosting platform. Use the promo code brewhouse at checkout for 10% off your first year.

Download Episode 15: Work Adequately, Live Abundantly

item.title: Episode 14: Product Design and Development - Live Episode
item.description:
What is the first question designers and developers are asked when approached to create a new product? How much time should be spent on design? How does Brewhouse approach dev-ops? This week, Kalv and Pat recorded a live episode of the podcast using our new favourite broadcasting app, Blab.im.

Show Notes

  • Loft 47
  • Philippe Creux
  • Replacing The User Story With The Job Story by Adam Klement
  • The Fidelity Curve: How to weigh the costs and benefits of creating UI mockups by Ryan Singer
  • Thoughtbot Playbook - Roles
  • Mixpanel for iPhone
  • Fitbit Aria
  • Follow Kalv on Twitter
  • Follow Pat on Twitter

The Brewhouse Show is proudly hosted by Feedpress, a simple, intuitive, and powerful RSS analytics and podcast hosting platform. Use the promo code brewhouse at checkout for 10% off your first year.

Download Episode 14: Product Design and Development - Live Episode
